name: Homemade Mango Ice Cream
history: This ice cream is a delightful blend of India's rich mango heritage with the creamy textures of Western-style ice creams.
description: A luscious, homemade mango ice cream with a rich mango flavor, perfect as a refreshing dessert.

instructions.title: Prepare Mango Puree
instructions.description: Peel and chop half a large mango. Blend into a smooth puree.

instructions.title: Whip the Cream
instructions.description: In a bowl, whip the heavy cream until it forms stiff peaks.

instructions.title: Combine Ingredients
instructions.description: Gently fold the mango puree and condensed milk into the whipped cream, ensuring not to deflate the cream.

instructions.title: Freeze
instructions.description: Transfer the mixture to a small freezer-safe container and freeze for at least 2 hours or until set.

tips: Choose ripe, sweet mangoes for a richer flavor.
For a firmer texture, freeze longer.
variations: Add a dash of cardamom for a traditional Indian flavor.
Incorporate chopped nuts for extra crunch.

storage.instructions: Keep in an airtight container in the freezer.

presentationTips: Drizzle with mango syrup for an enhanced flavor.
